game.name: TS Marketplace: Snps Wagon Pack 02
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Snps wagon is a flatbed design to transport longitudinal beams, like logs, pipework and timber. They are open flat beds with high supporting pillars, used to tie-down loads. Almost 2000 of the wagons were present at their peak in the 1990s, over 1100 are still in service across Germany.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Snps wagon is a flatbed design to transport longitudinal beams, like logs, pipework and timber. They are open flat beds with high supporting pillars, used to tie-down loads. Almost 2000 of the wagons were present at their peak in the 1990s, over 1100 are still in service across Germany.
